context_of_use: This use case allows customers to track the status and delivery progress of their orders within the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: To know the delivery status of their orders.
description: Allow customers to track order status and delivery progress.
triggering_event: Customer requests to track an order.
preconditions: The customer must have placed an order.
The customer must be logged into their account.
postconditions: The customer receives the current status and delivery progress of their order.
assumptions: The system has access to the order tracking information.
The customer has a valid order to track.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to track their orders.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the format of order tracking information.
main_flow: 1. Customer requests to track an order â†’ System retrieves the order status.
2. System displays the current status and delivery progress to the customer.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the order is not found, then the system displays an error message indicating that the order cannot be tracked.
